frame.name: Gradable_artistic_quality
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains LUs that ascribe an artistic quality to a work. This frame does not contain "period" words such as "romantic" or "classical".
<ex>With its lack of decor, <fex name="Entity">the church</fex> seems <fex name="Degree">quite</fex> <t>austere</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> for which a particular gradable <fen>Attribute</fen> is appropriate and under consideration.
</def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Entity</fen> or <fen>Attribute</fen> from the norm.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> or its <fen>Attribute</fen> is in the state of having the specified style.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> or its <fen>Attribute</fen> has a particular style.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location where the <fen>Entity</fen> has the <fen>Attribute</fen> to a given <fen>Degree</fen>.</def-root>
